steps.name: Verify Bluetooth permission dialog is displayed
$("By.xpath: //*[@text='Allow Bluetooth scans and connections?']") should be(visible)
$("By.xpath: //*[@text='Allows you to scan and connect to nearby MY01 devices. This feature is required for the MY01 Application to function properly.']") should be(visible)
